title: Shirtless Orlando Bloom Shows Off His Beach Bod in Malibu - Yahoo Celebrity UK
text:
The 38-year-old splashed around in the surf and played bocce ball with pals, including surf legend Laird Hamilton and country singer Kenny Chesney, during the group’s beach day. Apollo/Ormus/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES 
Who knew Bloom had such a diverse group of famous friends?! Or that beach body, for that matter. 
The English actor definitely likes being near large bodies of water. He’ll reprise his role as the swashbuckling Will Turner in Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales slated for release in July 2017. This is his first time Bloom is returning to the franchise since 2007’s Pirates of the Caribbean: At World’s End , as he opted out of the third and fourth installments of the Disney franchise. 
WATCH: Master Fall Menswear Like Orlando Bloom 
Bloom is probably best known, however, for his role as Legolas in The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogies. Watch him in full costume (pointy ears and all!) signing autographs on the set of The Hobbit in the video below.
